description: This file is a React component written in TypeScript, specifically a page component for a recipe discovery application. It includes React hooks, UI component definitions, and data fetching logic for rendering a recipe list with search and filter functionality.

methods.name: SearchBar
methods.description: A React component providing a search input field with submit functionality.

methods.name: CategoryFilter
methods.description: A React component for displaying and selecting recipe categories.

methods.name: SkeletonCard
methods.description: A placeholder skeleton UI component shown during loading states.

methods.name: RecipeCard
methods.description: A React component displaying individual recipe information as a clickable card.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component for the recipe discovery page, managing state, data fetching, and rendering the UI.
